scripts.build: cd backend && npx prisma db push && yarn run tsc
scripts.prep: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend,mobile' -c 'bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgWhite.bold' 'cd backend && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && yarn' 'cd frontend/web && yarn' 'cd frontend/mobile && yarn'
scripts.launch: concurrently -n 'backend,studio,frontend,mobile' -c 'bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgWhite.bold' 'cd backend && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && yarn run dev' 'cd backend && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && yarn run studio' 'cd frontend && yarn run web' 'cd frontend && yarn run ios'
scripts.dev: cd backend && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && cd .. && yarn prep && yarn launch
